snippet: Representative Scott DesJarlais has been battered by the news media after a taped phone call of the anti-abortion Republican appeared to show him pressuring a mistress to terminate her pregnancy.
abstract: Representative Scott DesJarlais has been battered by the news media after a taped phone call of the anti-abortion Republican appeared to show him pressuring a mistress to terminate her pregnancy.

headline.main: Conservative Group Calls for Tennessee Republican's Resignation
